rules: Rule1: Provided that the vehicle is registered on the platform, it is not verified on the platform.
Rule2: Either the publication is restricted on the platform or it is not compliant with the vehicle.
Rule3: Under the condition that the publication is uploaded to the platform, it is processed on the platform.
Rule4: If the publication is processed on the platform, then it is not restricted on the platform.
Rule5: Provided that the publication is shared by the vehicle, it is not downloaded by the vehicle.
Rule6: Under the condition that the publication is distributed by the vehicle, it is shared by the vehicle.
Rule7: If the platform is premium, then were the platform not authenticated, the publication would be distributed by the vehicle.
Rule8: The platform is premium or the platform is standard.
Rule9: Under the condition that the platform is standard, the platform is basic.
Rule10: If the platform is basic, then were the platform not authenticated, the publication would be distributed by the vehicle.
Rule11: Provided that the publication is formatted on the platform, it is converted on the platform.
Rule12: Either the publication is formatted on the platform or it is encrypted on the platform.

Rule13: If the publication is encrypted on the platform, then whenever the publication is published on the platform, were the platform not authenticated, the vehicle would be approved on the platform.

Rule14: Under the condition that the publication is validated on the platform, then if the publication is optimized on the platform, and if it is formatted on the platform, it is accessible on the platform.
Rule15: Provided that the platform is subscribed to the vehicle, the vehicle is verified on the platform.
Rule16: Either the platform is subscribed to the vehicle or the platform is authenticated.
Rule17: Were it not the case that if the publication is converted on the platform then it is accessible on the platform, the publication would be rejected by the platform.
Rule18: Were it not the case that if the platform is subscribed to the vehicle then the vehicle is registered on the platform, the publication would be compliant with the vehicle.
Rule19: Provided that the platform is not authenticated, the publication is downloaded by the vehicle.
Rule20: If the platform is not authenticated, then it is not the case that the vehicle is approved on the platform.
facts: Fact1: The publication is uploaded to the platform.
Fact2: The publication is published on the platform.
Fact3: The publication is optimized on the platform.
Fact4: The publication is validated on the platform.
Fact5: The publication is not rejected by the platform.
Fact6: The publication is not accessible on the platform.
